text: Verviers is a municipality in the Belgian province of Liège and in the Arrondissement of Verviers. In 2007, 54150 people lived there. It is at 50° 35 North, 05° 51 East. == Well-known people == * Henri Pirenne (1862-1935), historian ==References== Category:Municipalities of Liège Category:Cities in Belgium
title: Verviers
